title: Advertise a Vacant Rental Unit
description: A rental unit will become vacant next month. The property manager needs to create and post a rental advertisement.

tasks.description: Gather details and photos of the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the unit's specs (beds, baths, sqft, rent amount) and at least 5 high-quality photos.

tasks.description: Write a compelling rental advertisement description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a marketing description highlighting key features and amenities.

tasks.description: Syndicate the advertisement to multiple rental listing websites (e.g., Zillow, Apartments.com).
tasks.expected_outcome: The advertisement is successfully posted to at least three major rental sites.
